title: Aloo Gobi
ist: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds. 2. Add chopped onions, sauté until golden. 3. Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, turmeric, red chili powder. 4. Add potatoes and cauliflower, cook covered until tender. 5. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.

title: Baingan Bharta
ist: 1. Roast eggplants over open flame until charred, peel skin. 2. Mash roasted eggplants. 3. Heat oil, sauté onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 4. Add tomatoes, cook until mushy. 5. Mix mashed eggplant, cook for 5-10 minutes. Garnish and serve with roti.

title: Bhindi Masala
ist: 1. Wash and dry okra, cut into pieces. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin, chopped onions. 3. Sauté onions till golden, add tomatoes and spices. 4. Add okra, cook uncovered until tender. Stir occasionally. Serve with chapati or rice.

title: Rajma Masala
ist: 1. Soak kidney beans overnight, pressure cook until soft. 2. Heat oil, sauté onions, ginger-garlic paste. 3. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates. 4. Add cooked rajma, simmer for 15-20 minutes. Serve with rice.

title: Vegetable Pulao
ist: 1. Rinse rice and soak for 20 minutes. 2. Heat oil, add whole spices and chopped onions. 3. Sauté until golden, add mixed vegetables and sauté. 4. Add soaked rice, water, and salt. Cook covered on low heat until rice is done.
